user.title: Connect to Qustodio
user.description: Enter your Qustodio account credentials to connect your profiles and devices.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Qustodio
reauth_confirm.description: The credentials for {username} are no longer valid. Please enter your password to reconnect.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Qustodio servers. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
error.already_configured: This Qustodio account is already configured.
error.no_profiles: No profiles found for this account. Please ensure you have at least one child profile set up in Qustodio.
error.rate_limit: Too many login attempts. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
error.service_unavailable: Qustodio service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

abort.already_configured: This Qustodio account is already configured.

init.title: Qustodio Options
init.description: Configure update interval and tracking settings.

data_description.update_interval: How often to check for updates (1-60 minutes)
data_description.enable_gps_tracking: Track device locations using GPS coordinates
data_description.app_usage_cache_interval: How often to refresh per-app usage data (5-1440 minutes)

authentication_error.title: Authentication Failed
authentication_error.description: Your Qustodio credentials are no longer valid. Please reauthenticate to continue receiving updates from your Qustodio account.

connection_error.title: Connection Issues
connection_error.description: Unable to connect to Qustodio servers. There have been {consecutive_failures} consecutive connection failures. Please check your internet connection. If the problem persists, the Qustodio service may be temporarily unavailable.

rate_limit_error.title: Rate Limit Exceeded
rate_limit_error.description: Too many requests to Qustodio API. Your current update interval is {update_interval} minutes. Consider increasing the update interval in the integration options to avoid rate limiting.

api_error.title: API Error
api_error.description: Qustodio API returned an error: {error_message} (Status: {status_code}). This may be a temporary issue. If it persists, please check the Qustodio service status or contact support.

data_error.title: Data Processing Error
data_error.description: Unable to process data from Qustodio API: {error_message}. This may indicate a temporary issue with the Qustodio service or an unexpected API response format.

generic_error.title: Qustodio Error
generic_error.description: An error occurred while communicating with Qustodio: {error_message}. Please check your configuration and try again.

unexpected_error.title: Unexpected Error
unexpected_error.description: An unexpected error occurred: {error_message}. Please check the Home Assistant logs for more details and consider reporting this issue if it persists.
